title.rendered: Bitcoin spikes outside US hours and traders could ‘take advantage’

content.rendered: Bitcoin has been seeing most of its gains outside U.S. trading hours since the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs.

excerpt.rendered: Bitcoin has been seeing most of its gains outside U.S. trading hours since the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs.
